src:
la candidata naranja insiste que el Gobierno no puede reconsiderar la petición de Escal UGS 
Julià (Cs) califica de "buena noticia" el sellado del Castor y espera que no sea un anuncio electoralista
02 Nov 2019 by Castellón Plaza
CASTELLÓ. La candidata de Ciudadanos al Congreso de los Diputados por la provincia de Castellón, Sandra Julià, ha indicado que “para Cs el sellado del Castor es una buena noticia ya que lo hemos reclamado en reiteradas ocasiones en la Cámara Baja” y ha recalcado que “esperamos que este sellado sea definitivo y no un anuncio meramente electoralista”.
En su visita a Vinaròs, Julià y otros candidatos de Cs se han acercado al Castor y allí mismo ha indicado que “los únicos titulares que podemos seguir tolerando respecto al Castor es los que traten su desmantelamiento”. “Después del anuncio del sellado no tendría sentido que el Gobierno reconsidere la petición de la empresa Escal UGS del no cerramiento del almacén submarino”, ha recalcado la candidata. “Si esto pasara –ha continuado diciendo la candidata de Cs- confirmaríamos un nuevo desafío de Sánchez a la Junta Electoral Central”.
 Julià ha trasladado “el apoyo a todos los vecinos de la zona que han sufrido los episodios sísmicos” porque “si el gobierno no se desdice, plegándose a los intereses económicos de empresarios amigos, este sellado es el final de vuestra pesadilla”
 

Noticias relacionadas
text:
the orange candidate insists that the Government cannot reconsider the request of Escal UGS
Julià (Cs) describes the beaver seal as "good news" and hopes it is not an election announcement
02 Nov 2019 by Castellón Plaza
CASTELLÓ. The candidate of Citizens to the Congress of Deputies for the province of Castellón, Sandra Julià, has indicated that “for Cs the sealing of the Beaver is good news since we have repeatedly claimed it in the Lower House” and stressed that “ we hope that this seal is definitive and not a merely electoralist announcement ”.
In his visit to Vinaròs, Julià and other Cs candidates have approached the Beaver and right there has indicated that "the only holders we can continue to tolerate regarding the Beaver are those who treat their dismantling." "After the announcement of the seal, it would not make sense for the Government to reconsider the request of the Escal UGS company for the non-enclosure of the underwater warehouse," the candidate stressed. "If this happens," the Cs candidate continued, "we would confirm a new challenge from Sánchez to the Central Electoral Board."
Julià has transferred “the support to all the neighbors of the area that have suffered the seismic episodes” because “if the government does not give up, folding itself to the economic interests of friendly businessmen, this seal is the end of your nightmare”
